00019 #ifndef _FIR_FILTER_HPP_cm131117_
00020 #define _FIR_FILTER_HPP_cm131117_
00021 
00022 #include "filter/fir.hpp"
00023 
00024 class fir_filter {
00025 public:
00026   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00027   typedef filter::fir::lowpass<double> fir_type;
00028 
00029   fir_filter(size_t n,
00030              double f,
00031              double x_slope=0.1)
00032     : n_(n)
00033     , f_(f)
00034     , shift_(0)
00035     , sample_counter_(n_-1)
00036     , b_(n, 0.)
00037     , phases_ (n, complex_type(1,0))
00038     , history_(n, complex_type(0,0)) {
00039     design(n, f, x_slope);
00040   }
00041 
00042   bool design(size_t n,
00043               double f,
00044               double x_slope=0.1) {
00045     n_ = n;
00046     f_ = f;
00047     b_.resize(n_, 0);
00048     phases_.resize(n_, 1);
00049     history_.resize(n_, 0);
00050     fir_type fir_design(n);
00051     fir_design.design(f, x_slope*f);
00052     std::copy(fir_design.coeff().begin(), fir_design.coeff().end(), b_.begin());    
00053     reset();
00054     return true;
00055   }
00056 
00057   void reset() {
00058     sample_counter_= 0;//n_-1;
00059     for (size_t i(0), n(history_.size()); i<n; ++i)
00060       history_[i] = 0;    
00061   }
00062 
00063   // shift by frequency f0 (normalized)
00064   // returns the true, quantized shift frequency
00065   double shift(double f0) { 
00066     long int shift(lround(f0*n_));
00067     while (shift >= int(n_/2)) shift -= n_;
00068     while (shift < -int(n_/2)) shift += n_;
00069     shift_ = double(shift)/double(n_);
00070     if (is_shifted()) {
00071       const double two_pi_f0(2*M_PI*shift_);
00072       for (size_t i(0); i<n_; ++i)
00073         phases_[i] = std::exp(-complex_type(0., two_pi_f0*i));
00074     }
00075     return shift_;
00076   }
00077 
00078   double get_shift() const { return shift_; }
00079   bool is_shifted() const { return shift_ != 0.; }
00080 
00081   void insert(complex_type sample) {
00082     for (size_t i(n_-1); i!=0; --i)
00083       history_[i] = history_[i-1];
00084     history_[0] = sample;
00085     sample_counter_++;
00086   }
00087   complex_type process() {
00088     complex_type result(0);
00089     if (is_shifted()) {
00090       for (size_t i(0); i<n_; ++i)
00091         result += history_[i] * phases_[i] * b_[i];
00092     } else {
00093       for (size_t i(0); i<n_; ++i)
00094         result += history_[i] * b_[i];
00095     }
00096     if (is_shifted()) {
00097       sample_counter_ %= phases_.size();
00098       result *= std::conj(phases_[sample_counter_]);
00099       // sample_counter_ = (sample_counter_ == 0) ? n_-1 : sample_counter_
00100     }
00101     return result;
00102   }
00103   complex_type process(complex_type sample) {
00104     insert(sample);
00105     return process();
00106   }
00107 
00108 protected:
00109 private:
00110   size_t n_;                          // filter size
00111   double f_;                          // cutoff frequency (normalized)
00112   double shift_;
00113   size_t sample_counter_;
00114   std::vector<double> b_;             // fir coefficients
00115   std::vector<complex_type> phases_;  // phases for frequency shift
00116   std::vector<complex_type> history_; // filter history
00117 } ;
00118 
00119 #endif // _FIR_FILTER_HPP_cm131117_
